description: DisenMoOD: Disentangled Multi-Objective Molecular Design Framework

features.description: Offline attribute augmentation using ADMETModel for missing labels (datasets/pl_data.py or dataset builder)
Disentangled VAE with z_shared and {z_pi} losses (models/egnn.py, models/guide_model.py)
Backbone-branch latent diffusion for z_shared and z_pi (models/molopt_score_model.py)
Correlation matrix module from molecule/pocket graphs with gated branch interaction (models/egnn.py, models/guide_model.py)
Training-free energy guidance with branch-local gradients and freezing (models/guide_model.py, models/molopt_score_model.py)
Correlation-aware multi-objective guidance and Pareto selection (models/molopt_score_model.py)
Expert predictor R2 evaluation during training (scripts/train_diffusion_joint.py, models/molopt_score_model.py)
Evaluation pipeline for HV/Sparsity, correlation error, intervention, docking (scripts/sample_diffusion_multi_for_pocket.py or new eval script)
